description.lang: 2016 Smart TVs, All 2016 SUHD TVs will include SmartThings Hub technology allowing the TV itself to act as the control center without a stand-alone hub. With the addition of a SmartThings Extend USB adaptor, SUHD TVs can connect and control with not only Samsung devices but more than 200 other SmartThings compatible devices from a wide range of third party manufacturers including connected lights, locks, thermostats, cameras, and all Samsung SmartThings sensors using Z-Wave protocols.
